university_policies:
Salisbury University minors require:
• The completion of at least 18 credits with grades of C or better.
• At least 15 credits applied toward the minor must be coursework that is not used to
satisfy General Education requirements.
• At least nine credits must be earned at SU.
minor_req:
• Complete courses with grades of C or better.
• Courses for the minor will be determined by the student’s major (see below).
req_1: REQUIREMENTS BY MAJOR • Economics: 2 courses history, 2 courses human geography, 2 courses political science • Geography: 2 courses history, 2 courses economics, 2 courses political science • History: 2 courses political science, 2 courses economics, 2 courses human geography • Political Science: 2 courses history, 2 courses economics, 2 courses human geography • Elementary and Early Childhood Education: 1 course history, 2 courses political science, 2 courses economics, 2 courses human geography (1 course from history and 1 course from human geography may also be used to satisfy General Education requirements) Courses may be selected from the following (circle courses taken):

course_1.subject: GEOG
course_1.title: World Geography: Africa and the Americas

course_1.subject: GEOG
course_1.title: Geography of the U.S. and Canada

course_1.subject: POSC
course_1.title: State and Local Government in the U.S.
